timeline.bodyText: This could be changed to PredicateLeaf -- see below

timeline.bodyText: Nit: maybe we should also explicitly mention in getExpression doc that it normalizes the expression

timeline.bodyText: maybe rename vars to compact and normalized ExpressionTree to avoid confusion?
timeline.author: pgaref

timeline.bodyText:
I believe Id setter and getter could be moved to the PredicateLeaf interface.
It would be cleaner and as a result addLeaf would need less modifications.
timeline.author: pgaref

replies.bodyText: I made getId more visible, but left setId as private. setId only makes sense in the context of the builder.
replies.author: omalley
